short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ITMS Record and Playback tool for ease of getting acquainted with ITMS WebDriver.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Selenium IDE alternative to record and export Selenium scripts. With reports & screenshots. Fast & open-source.
iTMS Recorder is also the perfect alternative web recorder to Selenium IDE by:
— Supporting the legacy Selenium IDE's commands and extension scripts (AKA user-extensions.js) for developing custom locator builders and actions. 
— Integrating with iTMS Jira Addon for advanced test generation, reporting, and test orchestration needs.
* iTMS Jira Addon link: https://marketplace.atlassian.com/apps/1222358
